name: Instinct Rush
detailed_description:
DEVELOPER'S NOTE:
Please expect 'Instinct Rush' to be a small, re-playable, score-chaser game where the only goals are to constantly beat your previous score and unlock some extra cars. I greatly appreciate feedback and will do my best to ensure support for my games. Please contact me through Twitter or the forums if you encounter something wrong with the game, something misleading on the store page, or you just want to say hello.
Thank you for taking a moment to read this; I really hope you enjoy playing my game.

GAMEPLAY:
Your car can collide into other cars to destroy them, but will be destroyed by cargoes.
Touch bars, cut off human, gain energy and you will be invincible, also you can pick up power ups to survive longer.
Drive as farther as you can while collecting coins to buy more cars that are more powerful.

short_description: Hit vehicle, rub guardrail, cut human body, and drive freely.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 CPU@3.6GHz or AMD FX-6100 CPU@3.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5+
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore
